config.section.behavior.name: Behavior
config.CopyQualitySetting.name: Copy item quality
config.CopyQualitySetting.description:
Enabled: The produced item has the same quality as the input item 
(i.e. blueberry of iridium quality produce iridium quality wine without a cask).

Auto (default): Like Enabled but only when specific mods are installed 
(see Nexus page of this mod).

Disabled: Disable this feature.
config.CaskOutsideCellarSetting.name: Allow cask outside cellar
config.CaskOutsideCellarSetting.descript: Allow the cask to work outside the cellar.
message.invalidCount: Requires 2 items of the same type.
message.invalidCount4: Requires 4 items of the same type.
message.invalidCount10: Requires 10 items of the same type.
doubleKeg.name: Double Keg
doubleKeg.description: Like the normal keg, but can process two items at once.
longJar.name: Long Preserves Jar
longJar.description: Like the normal preserves jar, but can process two items at once ... and is a bit loonger.
longCask.name: Long Cask
longCask.description:
Can process two items at once.

Note: Will produce only iridium quality, no lower quality
(wine will be done only in 56 days)
doubleFurnace.name: Double Furnace
doubleFurnace.description: Like the normal furnace, but can process two items at once.
